pages.text: Wa Al-Ladhina Yu'utuna Ma 'Ataw Wa Qulubuhum Wa Jilatun 'Annahum 'Ila Rabbihim Raji`una
Ula'ika Yusari`una Fi Al-Khayrati Wa Hum Laha Sabiquna
Wa La Nukallifu Nafsaan 'Illa Wus`aha Wa Ladayna Kitabun Yantiqu Bil-Haqqi Wa Hum La Yuzlamun
Bal Qulubuhum Fi Ghamratin Min Hadha Wa Lahum 'A`malun Min Duni Dhalika Hum Laha `Amiluna
La Taj'aru Al-Yawma 'Innakum Minna La Tunsaruna
Afalam Yaddabbaru Al-Qawla 'Am Ja'ahum Ma Lam Ya'ti 'Aba'ahumu Al-'Awwalina
Am Lam Ya`rifu Rasulahum Fahum Lahu Munkiruna
Am Yaquluna Bihi Jinnatun Bal Ja'ahum Bil-Haqqi Wa 'Aktharuhum Lilhaqqi Karihuna
Wa Lawi Attaba`a Al-Haqqu 'Ahwa'ahum Lafasadati As-Samawatu Wa Al-'Arđu Wa Man Fihinna Bal 'Ataynahum Bidhikrihim Fahum `An Dhikrihim Mu`riđuna
Am Tas'aluhum Kharjaan Fakharaju Rabbika Khayrun Wa Huwa Khayru Ar-Raziqina
Wa 'Inna Al-Ladhina La Yu'uminuna Bil-'Akhirati `Ani As-Sirati Lanakibuna
